data.comment: The match is underway. Derby County have kicked-off.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has commenced. Bristol City with the kick-off.
Lee Buchanan (Derby County) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Chris Brunt is replacing Callum O'Dowda for the home team.
In the minute 70, Bristol City make their second substitution with Famara Diedhiou replacing Chris Martin.
Morgan Whittaker is on a sub for Duane Holmes for Derby County.
Famara Diedhiou puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 81, The away team replace Max Bird with Louie Sibley.
Bristol City make their third substitution with Taylor Moore replacing Nahki Wells.
Jahmal Hector-Ingram is on a sub for Nathan Byrne for Derby County.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
The home team replace Jamie Paterson with Tommy Rowe.
